keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

byline.contributor: Milan Schreuer and Aurelien Breeden contributed reporting from Brussels, and Lilia Blaise from Paris.

lead_paragraph: The arrest of Mr. Abdeslam, a suspect in the Nov. 13 terrorist attacks, highlights the challenges authorities face in the insular Molenbeek neighborhood of Brussels.

headline.print_headline: After Manhunt, Scrutiny of Brussels as Hiding Place
headline.main: The Arrest of Salah Abdeslam, a Paris Suspect, Ends Manhunt, Not Questions

snippet: The arrest of Mr. Abdeslam, a suspect in the Nov. 13 terrorist attacks, highlights the challenges authorities face in the insular Molenbeek neighborhood of Brussels.
abstract: Belgian authorities are criticized for shortcomings in  counterterrorism efforts after 125-day manhunt for Salah Abdelsam ends with fugitive found in Molenbeek neighborhood where he grew up.
